body_html:
Currently tf.estimator.RunConfig doesn't have cluster as an argument. It parses cluster_spec from "TF_CONFIG" environment variable. Its documentation provides examples for how to set it.
You can get cluster_spec from ClusterResolver and set the environment variable.
body_text:
Currently tf.estimator.RunConfig doesn't have cluster as an argument. It parses cluster_spec from "TF_CONFIG" environment variable. Its documentation provides examples for how to set it.
You can get cluster_spec from ClusterResolver and set the environment variable.
body:
Currently `tf.estimator.RunConfig` doesn't have cluster as an argument. It parses `cluster_spec` from `"TF_CONFIG"` environment variable. Its [documentation](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/RunConfig#__init__) provides examples for how to set it.
You can get `cluster_spec` from `ClusterResolver` and set the environment variable.
